name: Lab-A-Territory (Strawberry Jammers, Silas Bazar, Tyler Mathews)
name_original: Lab-A-Territory (Strawberry Jammers, Silas Bazar, Tyler Mathews)
description:
Global Game Jam 2020 submission

Lab-a-Territory is a 2 player pvp arena where 2 robots fight for the integrity of a laboratory. One bent on the destruction of all things and the other repairing the destruction. It's a fun, action packed, slightly isometric, couch co-op, party game for all ages.
